conclusion: The coil is a square with side length L and N turns, rotating with angular velocity Ï‰ about an axis perpendicular to a uniform magnetic field B.
The axis is coplanar with the coil and the ab side is L/4 from the axis.
The magnetic flux through the coil is Î¦ = B â‹… A â‹… cos(Î¸), where A = LÂ² is the area of the coil and Î¸ is the angle between the normal to the coil and the magnetic field.

The induced EMF is then ğ“” = N B LÂ² Ï‰ sin(Ï‰t).
